headline.main: BID TO VISIT ENGLAND DISCUSSED BY WOMEN; Mrs. Roosevelt and Aides of 17 Groups Weigh Proposal

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 28 -- The proposal to send a selected group of fourteen women of the United States to Great Britain to study the effort of women in national defense was discussed today at a meeting of representatives of seventeen women's organizations with Mrs. Roosevelt and Miss Eloise Davison, assistant director of the Office of Civilian Defense.
abstract: proposal discussed by women organizations reprs, Wash, D C
